name: Giant Water Elemental
description: The Giant Water Elemental is a massive and formidable being of water, capable of manipulating its form fluidly within combat, making it an imposing presence in any aquatic environment.
memorable: Notable for its ability to simultaneously grapple multiple creatures while moving freely and its dangerous conductive trait that harms those who attack it with lightning.
goals: Typically aims to dominate battles in aquatic settings and defend its territory.
relations: May serve as guardians of water bodies or be found alongside lesser water elementals.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic settings or near bodies of water.
strengths: High hit points and damage immunities to poison, along with resistances to acid and nonmagical weapon damage.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma scores limit its utility outside of combat.
attacks: Utilizes powerful slam attacks and can grapple multiple foes, restricting their movement and ability to breathe.
most_powerful_ability: Whelm, which can grapple all creatures in its space, restraining them and allowing it to move freely.
additional_information: Conductive trait that harms adjacent creatures if it takes lightning damage.
Fluid Form ability allows it to move through tight spaces.
Freeze ability that hampers its speed when taking cold damage.
test_queries: massive water monster that grapples opponents
giant elemental with fluid movement abilities
water creature immune to poison and grapples
powerful aquatic being with lightning damage reflection
huge water elemental with high hit points
